1.title: The Return
1.plot: Levi is back to show the world how the Amish really live; Ohio boss, Merlin is threatened when Sam Mullet is released from prison; Caleb becomes increasingly frustrated with Levi¹s lack of respect and decides to accept an offer from Alan.

2.title: A Church Divided
2.plot: Rogue Mennonites invade Lancaster; Levi receives frantic calls to return home; Merlin creates an Ordnung and confronts the Governor.

3.title: Love Your Enemies
3.plot: The Amish elders ask Levi and Merlin to join forces. Levi then mobilizes the Amish to vote for the first-time ever while Merlin and Mary go after one of Doug¹s men.

4.title: Forbidden Knowledge
4.plot: Levi searches for answers and allies as a long-held Amish secret is put in jeopardy of being exposed. The Mennonites step up attacks on Levi's business interests but tensions begin to arise between Alan and Doug over broken promises. Merlin continues his holy pursuit and puts pressure on Levi to pony up funds.

5.title: Merlin's Judas
5.plot: Levi asks the bishops for an Ordnung change; Doug and Alan track down a deacon who¹s collecting Amish Aid; the Constable attempts to find out why Levi has been socializing with an English woman.

6.title: False Prophets
6.plot: The auction looms large as Levi and the Mennonites battle for control of the Book of Menno. The Constable steps up his investigation into Levi, but he may have gone too far. Merlin and Mary find themselves in NYC after confronting uncomfortable truths about their Amish upbringing. Doug and his crew dig for the book as Levi tries to deal with the government and upcoming election.

7.title: Day of Reckoning
7.plot: Tensions mount as upcoming elections for governor approach; Levi gets a visit from Susanna; Doug orders an act of revenge.

8.title: The End Is Near
8.plot: Secrets are revealed about Levi and the Amish Mafia during the finale of the series. Also, Doug leaves his followers and Alan steps up to assume responsibility for the community.

9.title: Amish Confidential
9.plot: In the series finale, secrets are revealed and alliances tested when Levi writes a controversial book after being shunned by the Amish.

1.title: No Peace for the Wicked
1.plot: The Amish Mafia is secret subculture within the Amish community of Lancaster, PA. They provide protection for their people and deliver righteous justice against those who stand in their way.

2.title: Fire from the Lord
2.plot: Amish Mafia boss Lebanon Levi and his crew hunt down one of their own - a crew member on the run and wanted for arrest by local law enforcement. Mafia soldier John throws a hut party that goes bad when someone shows up with "green corn".

3.title: Devil Comes Calling
3.plot: Amish Mafia Boss Lebanon Levi and his crew run a secret MMA barn fight. Mafia soldier Jolin must do battle and win to bring in money and maintain respect for the crew. Meanwhile, Ohio's Amish Mafia Boss, Merlin, uses John in an attempt to damage Levi.

4.title: The Book of Levi
4.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

5.title: Fall from Grace
5.plot: In a desperate attempt to repay his debts to Ohio boss Merlin, John sets up an illegal buggy race in the heart of Levi's territory. Esther lures Levi away and makes a shocking revelation that will alter the balance of power in Lancaster, PA.

6.title: Holy War
6.plot: Levi's crew splinters just as his war with Ohio boss Merlin escalates. Each member of Levi's crew has to decide if they will leave or stand by Levi and fight.

7.title: The Reckoning
7.plot: In this special episode, loaded with never before seen footage, producers track down members of the now fractured Lancaster and Ohio mafia crews to ask hard-hitting questions about their lives, the Amish community, and the authenticity of the show.

8.title: The Book of Merlin
8.plot:
Know what this is about?
 Be the first one to add a plot.

9.title: Amish Exorcism
9.plot: Esther and John engage in an Amish Exorcism to save their brother. Levi tries to rebuild his crew. Merlin attempts to regain control of the Ohio Amish community. Alan and Jolin must choose between darkness and light.

10.title: The Resurrection
10.plot: Lebanon Levi and his crew look back at Season One of Amish Mafia and look forward to what lies ahead in Season Two.

1.title: Wayward Sons
1.plot: Lebanon Levi leans on a new soldier as Jolin finds his bearings in Lancaster; Esther and brothers return to Lancaster to find unexpected problems; Ohio Amish Mafia enforcer, Wayne handles an issue with raw milk that threatens the community.

2.title: Prodigal Son
2.plot: Ohio Mafia Boss Merlin recruits Alan to go after Lebanon Levi; Freeman and John are causing trouble in town which Esther worries will affect her community standing. Jolin rejoins Levi's crew after a promise is made.

3.title: Paradise
3.plot: Merlin and Alan join forces to go after Levi's business. Jolin's authority is tested in Paradise. Big Steve is found and revenge is taken. Esther tries to make peace with Levi while Merlin and Wayne's friendship comes to an end.

4.title: Brother's Keeper
4.plot: Merlin and Alan join forces to go after Levi's business; Jolin's authority is tested in Paradise; Big Steve is found and revenge is taken; Esther tries to make peace with Levi while Merlin and Wayne's friendship comes to an end.

5.title: The Last Supper
5.plot: Family alliances are put to the test as Esther has to choose between John and Levi. Alan has an audience with the Bishop in an attempt to dethrone Levi. When faced with the Church's retribution, Levi is forced make a life altering decision.

6.title: Sacrificial Lamb
6.plot: Levi looks to make amends with the Bishop by punishing one of his own. Alan goes to court to find out if he will wind up in prison. Wayne gets church approval to take over Ohio's Amish Aid. Merlin seals an alliance.

7.title: Judgment Day
7.plot: Never-before seen footage and exclusive interviews show what really happened behind the scenes during this season's run of "Amish Mafia." The group talks about its reaction to the show and shows proof that the show is absolutely real.

8.title: A Very Amish Christmas
8.plot: Merlin takes it upon himself to educate everyone about the true meaning of Christmas by any means necessary; Levi uses the holiday to make money off of the English; Wayne protects his community while Esther reunites with John Freeman.

16.title: End of Days
16.plot: The true reasons why Levi and his crew quit one of the most popular shows on television will be revealed through exclusive interviews with the private investigator, the local law enforcement officer and never-before-seen footage.

1.title: He Has Risen
1.plot: Levi reasserts his control over the Lancaster County Amish. Jolin and Alvin eliminate outside threats.Merlin plots his revenge on Wayne.

2.title: De Rott
2.plot: Esther must convince Levi to bring John back into the fold; Levi is confronted about by Amish leaders from around the country about his vanity; Big Steve travels to Iowa to rescue an Amish girl; Merlin sends a very personal message to Wayne.

3.title: Deadly Sins
3.plot: External pressure forces Levi to make changes. Caleb starts fresh in Indiana. Esther prepares to reclaim her family's name, while John feeds information to law enforcement. Merlin adds an ally as Wayne comes under attack.

4.title: Joining the Flock
4.plot: Levi gets closer to marrying Esther; John gathers new information to use against Levi; Wayne gets revenge on Ruck just as the Church begins to question Wayne; Merlin learns a new skill and looks for the most feared Amish man in the world, the Bear.

5.title: The Bear
5.plot: Levi gets out of town and leaves Alvin in charge. Jolin reestablishes Amish Aid in Wisconsin by force. Merlin negotiates with the Bear, a powerful Amish leader. Esther discovers Levi's lies and confronts him in Atlantic City.

6.title: Doppel Leben
6.plot: After being discovered by Esther in Atlantic City, Levi returns to Lancaster County in a rage; Levi's crew take down a Maydll Gucka [Amish strip club]; Esther's double life in the English world leads to a terrifying encounter.

7.title: Shepherds' End
7.plot: The true reasons why Levi and his crew quit one of the most popular shows on television will be revealed through exclusive interviews with the Private Investigator, the local law enforcement officer, and never before seen footage.

8.title: Aftershow
8.plot: A gathering of cast members old and new join as they watch scenes from the past season and discuss their views and opinions of the goings on in the Amish community.

imdb.plot outline: Untrusting of outside law enforcement, some Amish in Lancaster County, PA have for many years regularly turned to a small organized group of men for protection and justice. The series provides a first-ever look at the men who protect and maintain peace and order within the Amish community in Lancaster. The 2006 School shootings in Lancaster County during which five young Amish girls were killed and five more seriously injured by a non-Amish milk truck driver brought to the nation's attention the vulnerabilities of the Amish community, and their need for continued protection.
imdb.title: Amish Mafia
plot: Untrusting of outside law enforcement, some Amish in Lancaster County, PA have for many years regularly turned to a small organized group of men for protection and justice. The series provides a first-ever look at the men who protect and maintain peace and order within the Amish community in Lancaster. The 2006 School shootings in Lancaster County during which five young Amish girls were killed and five more seriously injured by a non-Amish milk truck driver brought to the nation's attention the vulnerabilities of the Amish community, and their need for continued protection.::Discovery Channel
synopsis:
Forgive them for they know not what they do. This show uses the word Mafia to depict Amish teenagers whom charge for holding dances and must use two hands to try and brandish a shotgun.
A wildly feeble attempt to look tough in this day and age of children like these playing with firearms and someone else getting hurt.
One minute watching this show is a minute you can never get back. It's so ridiculous you won't even laugh at it as you turn the channel.
